reference: Branson, W. H. (1985), Causes of Appreciation and volatility of the dollar, in Federal Reserve Bank of Kansas City, editor, The U.S. Dollar--Recent Developments, Outlook, and Policy Options, Kansas City, pp. 33-54.
Grossman, Gene (1984), Imports as a Cause of Injury: The Case of the U.S. Steel Industry, NBER Working Paper, No. 1494, November.
David G. Hartman (1986), Focus on the Changing International Economic Environment, Focus: World Outlook, Data Resources, Inc., Spring.
Soloman, R. (1985), Effects of the Strong Dollars, same volume as Branson (1985), pp. 65-88.
